model Module¶

Created on Nov 30, 2011

@author: nicorotstein

class model.Grapher(nodes, edges, judge)[source]¶

handles all things related to graph handling it keeps the graph and a dictionary of nodes whose key is the node id and the value is the node itself

class model.Judge(arguments)[source]¶

use this class with a list of arguments, in order to determine the existence of conflict and defeat between arguments use this class with a graph of arguments, in order to evaluate it and obtain the set of warranted arguments
